rules_text:
Trample, haste
Encircling Tyrant enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When it does, it gains shielded until your next turn. [i](Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)[/i]
Helvete {X}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature and paying its helvete cost reduced by that creature's power. It enters with a finality counter on it.)[/i]
